title: PWM
tooltip: A simple node.js application intended to read and write analog values to fade a LED from Digital pins (PWM) on the Intel based development boards such as the Intel(R) Galileo and Edison with Arduino breakout board.
description: A simple node.js application intended to read and write analog values to fade a LED from Digital pins (PWM) on the Intel based development boards such as the Intel(R) Galileo and Edison with Arduino breakout board.
